Summary: Triangle shaped lights in sky moved across sky rapidly then disappeared
trends: There have been 42 other sightings in Reading
There were no other sightings in Reading on or around August 1st 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving north in Reading on Hampton Blvd around midnight, and saw in the sky in front above me the three circle lights in a perfect triangle, it was a very bright white, which caught my attention. I had no idea what it was I ruled out plane or helicopter instantly. It was small in the sky but bigger than any man made thing I've seen. It seemed to be hovering in a way, and moving rapidly towards the northwest, descending. I lost sight of it through the tree line a few times, but still saw it. When I got past the tree line it was gone. I was in awe and kind of freaked out when i was viewing it. Afterwards, I got chills and had the feeling of being watched. I wanted to get my camera out but was driving...
